extendedInfo.description: Free.  Accept Credit Cards Everywhere.  24x7. Offline Processing. Your mobile device is now your Mobile Credit Card machine.  Easy Charge is the easiest way to start processing credit cards today.NO Long Term ContractFast ApprovalsNo Setup Fees----Easy Steps----1. Go to www.5thdl.com and complete the FREE simple application.2. Get Approved.3. Start Selling!----Application Features----Fraud detection toolsLOWEST RatesCard swipe technologySecure connectionOnline account managementHistorical transaction logsFREE Virtual Credit Card MachineFull Touch Screen SupportProcess Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover CardsCall us at 1-888-336-4227.Visit us at www.5thdl.com.Email apps@5thdl.com.

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe how easy this app is.  I can charge my customers credit cards without carrying a cc machine with me.  Thank you Easy Charge!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great app! Simplifies all of my processing needs. Fast and easy to use!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
